ids.notes: electrodragon; programming via pin header does not work
modified and broken ct-065w eco plug; Has an esp-12 module instead of default because the magic smoke left, and the voltage current sense was cut.

name: Wolverine Chiller
flash_warning: Make sure no one is using the laser cutter

name: Bumblebee Chiller
flash_warning: Make sure no one is using the laser cutter

name: Fablab Chiller
flash_warning: Make sure no one is using the laser cutter. Also, this will reset any power monitoring calibration.

name: Genie Charging
flash_warning: This will reset any power monitoring calibration

name: Wolverine
flash_warning: Make sure no one is using the laser cutter. Also, this will reset any power monitoring calibration.

name: Bumblebee
flash_warning: Make sure no one is using the laser cutter. Also, this will reset any power monitoring calibration.

commands.payload: on button1#state do publish cmnd/i3/inside/hallway/light/POWER TOGGLE endon
on button1#state do publish cmnd/i3/inside/classroom/lights-east/POWER TOGGLE endon

name: Chinesium Laser
flash_warning: Make sure no one is using the laser cutter. Also this will reset any power monitoring calibration

commands.payload: on switch1#state do publish cmnd/i3/inside/b-side/office/lights/power 2 endon
on switch1#state do publish cmnd/i3/inside/lights/west/power 2 endon

commands_extra.payload: on event#MCPINT_D8=0 do publish cmnd/i3/inside/lights/west/power 0 endon on event#MCPINT_D9=0 do publish cmnd/i3/inside/lights/west/power 1 endon

commands.payload: on switch1#state do publish cmnd/i3/inside/craftroom/light/power 2 endon

name: Fablab AC
flash_warning: This will reset any power monitoring calibration.

name: Snapple Compressor
flash_warning: This will reset any power monitoring calibration.

commands_extra.payload: on event#MCPINT_D13=1 do backlog sensor29 3,ON; sensor29 2,OFF endon on event#MCPINT_D13=0 do backlog sensor29 3,OFF; sensor29 2,ON endon on Event#glasslock=LOCKED do backlog sensor29 0,ON; sensor29 1,OFF endon on Event#glasslock=UNLOCKED do backlog sensor29 0,OFF; sensor29 1,ON endon
on Mqtt#Connected do backlog subscribe glasslock,stat/i3/inside/classroom/glass-door/lock; publish cmnd/i3/inside/classroom/glass-door/lock endon
